00001 <?php
00013 class TemplateIO {
00017  private static $ioDrivers = array(
00018   // name => array(class, instance)
00019   'file'     => array('TemplateFileIO',     null),
00020   'string'   => array('TemplateStringIO',   null),
00021  );
00022  
00029  public static function get($driver) {
00030   if (!isset(self::$ioDrivers[$driver])) {
00031    throw new TemplateError(
00032     'Unknown I/O driver: "'.$driver.'"',
00033     TemplateError::E_UNKNOWN_PLUGIN
00034    );
00035   }
00036   
00037   if (!self::$ioDrivers[$driver][1]) {
00038    $klass = self::$ioDrivers[$driver][0];
00039    
00040    if (!class_exists($klass)) {
00041     throw new TemplateError(
00042      'Class "'.$klass.'" registered for I/O driver "'.$driver.'" does not exist',
00043      TemplateError::E_INVALID_PLUGIN
00044     );
00045    }
00046    
00047    self::$ioDrivers[$driver][1] = new $klass;
00048    self::$ioDrivers[$driver][1]->driverID = $driver;
00049    
00050    if (!(self::$ioDrivers[$driver][1] instanceof ITemplateIODriver)) {
00051     throw new TemplateError(
00052      'I/O driver "'.$driver.'" does not implement ITemplateIODriver',
00053      TemplateError::E_INVALID_PLUGIN
00054     );
00055    }
00056   }
00057   
00058   return self::$ioDrivers[$driver][1];
00059  }
00060  
00067  public static function register($driver, $className) {
00068   if (mb_strpos($driver, '://') !== false) {
00069    throw new TemplateError('I/O driver name cannot contain "://"', TemplateError::E_INVALID_ARGUMENT);
00070   }
00071   self::$ioDrivers[$driver] = array($className, null);
00072  }
00073 }
00074 
00078 class TemplateFileIO implements ITemplateIODriver {
00084  protected function pfn(array &$settings, &$template) {
00085   $out = $settings['outputPrefix'].'tpl.'.$template;
00086   return array(
00087    $settings['inputPrefix'].$template,
00088    $out.'.code.php', $out.'.metadata'
00089   );
00090  }
00091  
00093  public function upToDate(array &$settings, &$template, $mode) {
00094   list($input, $codeOutput, $metaOutput) = $this->pfn($settings, $template);
00095   
00096   if (!file_exists($input)) {
00097    throw new TemplateError(
00098     'Template "'.$input.'" does not exist. Check for prefix correctness and filename misspellings',
00099     TemplateError::E_IO_LOAD_FAILURE
00100    );
00101   }
00102   
00103   if ($mode == TemplateEnviron::RECOMPILE_ALWAYS || !file_exists($codeOutput) || !file_exists($metaOutput)) {
00104    // if either metadata or compiled code is missing, then recompilation is necessary
00105    // if mode is RECOMPILE_ALWAYS then no checks are necessary
00106    return false;
00107   } elseif ($mode == TemplateEnviron::RECOMPILE_NEVER) {
00108    // if both output file exist then compilation is not required
00109    return true;
00110   } elseif ($mode == TemplateEnviron::RECOMPILE_IF_CHANGED) {
00111    // we know that file exists, but we don't know whether source has changed since last compilation
00112    return (filemtime($codeOutput) >= filemtime($input));
00113   } else {
00114    throw new TemplateError(
00115     'Invalid recompilation mode set ('.$mode.') for template "'.$template.'"',
00116     TemplateError::E_INVALID_ARGUMENT
00117    );
00118   }
00119  }
00120  
00122  public function includeCode(array &$settings, &$template) {
00123   $className = $this->className($settings, $template);
00124   if (class_exists($className)) return $className;
00125   
00126   list($input, $codeOutput,) = $this->pfn($settings, $template);
00127   include_once $codeOutput;
00128   
00129   if (!class_exists($className)) {
00130    throw new TemplateError(
00131     'Compiled template "'.$codeOutput.'" is damaged (class "'.$className.'" does not exist) - recompile.',
00132     TemplateError::E_IO_LOAD_FAILURE
00133    );
00134   }
00135   
00136   return $className;
00137  }
00138  
00140  public function className(array &$settings, &$template) {
00141   return TemplateUtils::className($template);
00142  }
00143  
00145  public function loadTemplate(array &$settings, &$template) {
00146   list($input,,) = $this->pfn($settings, $template);
00147   return file_get_contents($input);
00148  }
00149  
00151  public function loadMetadata(array &$settings, &$template) {
00152   list($input,,$metaOutput) = $this->pfn($settings, $template);
00153   return unserialize(file_get_contents($metaOutput));
00154  }
00155  
00157  public function saveTemplate(array &$settings, &$template, &$code) {
00158   list($input,$codeOutput,) = $this->pfn($settings, $template);
00159   return file_put_contents($codeOutput, $code, LOCK_EX);
00160  }
00161  
00163  public function saveMetadata(array &$settings, &$template, array &$metadata) {
00164   list($input,,$metaOutput) = $this->pfn($settings, $template);
00165   return file_put_contents($metaOutput, serialize($metadata), LOCK_EX);
00166  }
00167 }

00172 class TemplateStringIO extends TemplateFileIO {
00173  protected function pfn(array &$settings, &$template) {
00174   $templateHash = crc32($template);
00175   $result       = parent::pfn($settings, $templateHash);
00176   $result[0]    = $settings['outputPrefix'].'tpl.'.$templateHash.'.source';
00177   
00178   if (!file_exists($result[0])) {
00179    file_put_contents($result[0], $template, LOCK_EX);
00180   }
00181   
00182   return $result;
00183  }
00184  
00185  public function upToDate(array &$settings, &$template, $mode) {
00186   list($input, $codeOutput, $metaOutput) = $this->pfn($settings, $template);
00187   return (
00188    $mode != TemplateEnviron::RECOMPILE_ALWAYS &&
00189    file_exists($codeOutput) && file_exists($metaOutput)
00190   );
00191  }
00192  
00193  public function includeCode(array &$settings, &$template) {
00194   $className = TemplateUtils::className(crc32($template));
00195   if (class_exists($className)) return $className;
00196 
00197   list($input, $codeOutput,) = $this->pfn($settings, $template);
00198   include_once $codeOutput;
00199   
00200   if (!class_exists($className)) {
00201    throw new TemplateError(
00202     'Compiled template "'.$codeOutput.'" is damaged (class "'.$className.'" does not exist) - recompile.',
00203     TemplateError::E_IO_LOAD_FAILURE
00204    );
00205   }
00206   
00207   return $className;
00208  }
00209  
00210  public function className(array &$settings, &$template) {
00211   return TemplateUtils::className(crc32($template));
00212  }
